result.eng: He is the richest person on the face of the earth.

result.eng: It was obvious from her face that she had been crying.

result.eng: The man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.

result.eng: A smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ga: bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora

result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.orig: muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
